task: Fix test failures for Intelligent Content Enhancement and Quality Assessment

issues_identified.issue: Module export missing for new functions
issues_identified.fix: Added Enhance-DocumentationContentIntelligently and Monitor-ContentQualityTrends to exports
Changed DocumentPath to FilePath for Assess-DocumentationQuality calls
Used Add-Member -Force for EndTime and Duration properties
Changed ErrorAction from SilentlyContinue to Stop for proper error handling

learnings_applied.application: Added -Global flag and proper error handling to all module imports
Validated object chain before property access
Ensured explicit imports with Global flag

new_learning_added.title: Module Export and State Management in Cross-Module Testing
new_learning_added.critical: Always export new functions and handle state initialization gracefully

next_steps.immediate: Run test suite to validate all fixes
next_steps.continuation: If tests pass, proceed to next implementation phase

response: RECOMMENDATION: TEST - C:\UnityProjects\Sound-and-Shoal\Unity-Claude-Automation\Test-Week3Day13Hour3-4-IntelligentContentEnhancement.ps1: Re-run comprehensive test suite to validate all fixes for module exports, state initialization, parameter corrections, and proper error handling.
